summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 APRILLA RSV4. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT 65 MPH, THE RPMS WOULD FLUCTUATE CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO STALL. THE CONTACT COASTED TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND RESTARTED THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE THE THROTTLE BODY WAS CLEANED HOWEVER, THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 9,200.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 APRILIA RSV4. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE COOLING HOSE CLAMP WAS LEAKING COOLANT. THE DEALER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND A COMPLAINT WAS FILED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 900.  *TR
